OverviewÂ¶

The ProteinMD API is organized into several key modules:

  • Core Simulation Engine - Core simulation engine and molecular dynamics functionality

  • Structure Handling - Protein structure handling, parsing, and manipulation

  • Force Fields - Force field implementations (AMBER, CHARMM, etc.)

  • Environment Models - Simulation environment setup (solvation, boundaries)

  • Analysis Tools - Analysis tools for trajectories and structures

  • Sampling Methods API Reference - Enhanced sampling methods and techniques

  • Visualization Tools API Reference - Molecular visualization and plotting utilities

  • Utilities API Reference - Utility functions and helper classes

  • Command Line Interface - Command-line interface
